metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38745 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Apache OpenOffice versions before 4.1.14 may be configured to add an empty entry to the Java class path. This may lead to run arbitrary Java code from the current directory.

criterions.comment: libreoffice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
